The kernel is like the brain of Linux. It controls EVERYTHING - memory, programs, devices. Kernel security is making sure the brain can't be tricked or taken over, because if the brain is hacked, everything is hacked!

In this lesson, we'll learn about linux kernel security in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
